name: Shengong 'Sui Shi' Pickaxe
description: The Shengong 'Sui Shi' Pickaxe is the Workshop equivalent of aSteel Pickaxe, allowing Prospectors to mine higher tier metals (Aluminium Ore,Platinum Ore, etc) at earlier stages of a Prospect while increasing yield.
crafted_at: Workshop Repair Kitat a poweredRepair Bench
